meanings.definition: The edible nutlike seed of the almond tree.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy snacking on almonds during my break.
meanings.sent2: She used almonds to make a delicious almond cake.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel stored almonds in its secret stash for winter.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like almonds in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly roasted almonds filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: The tree itself, native to southwestern Asia, having pink flowers and a fruit that contains an edible seed.
meanings.sent1: The almond tree in our backyard blooms beautifully in spring.
meanings.sent2: Almonds grow on the almond tree in our garden.
meanings.sent3: The almond tree whispered secrets to the wind.
meanings.sent4: The almond tree stood tall like a guardian of the garden.
meanings.sent5: The shade of the almond tree provided a cool retreat on hot days.
